cab.content: 5abT^^" . this Document is the Property of /Y His Britannic majestyv GovernmentJ_^military secret. 992hall 5^ - fiJFrom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,\2th July 1919.(Received 13th.)9454. 12th July, No. 62. .Part 1. J.' Some increase in Mohmand lashkars on Dakka front reported.2. Parties of Tori Kbed and Mohrnit Kbel Wazirs still active east of IWiraushah. Force of oOO Gurbaz and Tamiis from Khost is reported on its way to join them.3. Malleson reports Herat news shows Jehad activity increasing. Mullahs and students collecting there.4. General situation unchanged.Part 2.-Nil.Para. 3 not communicated to Press.
